text: The 2007 Asian Cycling Championships took place at the Bangkok and Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand from 3 to 10 September 2007. ==Medal summary== ===Road=== ====Men==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ====Women==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ===Track=== ====Men==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |1 km time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Madison | Jang Sun-jae Jang Chan-jae | Makoto Iijima Kazuhiro Mori | Mehdi Sohrabi Amir Zargari |- |Team sprint | Feng Yong Lin Feng Zhang Lei | Kang Dong-jin Choi Lae-seon Park Soo-hyun | Farshid Farsinejadian Mahmoud Parash Hassan Ali Varposhti |- |Team pursuit | Li Wei Qu Xuelong Chen Libin Ma Teng | Amir Zargari Alireza Haghi Hossein Nateghi Mehdi Sohrabi | Jang Sun-jae Jang Chan-jae Hwang In-hyeok Kim Tae-gyun |} ====Women==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |500 m time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Team sprint | Guo Shuang Zheng Lulu | Uyun Muzizah Santia Tri Kusuma | Jutatip Maneephan Wathinee Luekajorh |} ==Medal table== ==See also== *2007 in track cycling ==References== * Results Asia Asia Cycling Category:Asian Cycling Championships Category:International cycle races hosted by Thailand
title: 2007 Asian Cycling Championships
